Creates an instance of ApiKeySignerClient.

<Note>
  `ServerSignerClient` extends `BaseSignerClient`, see the docs for
  BaseSignerClient for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { ServerSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`ServerSignerClientParams`
The parameters for the client, including the API key and connection config

### params.connection

`ConnectionConfig`
The connection configuration for the client

### params.apiKey.publicKey

`string`
The public key of the API key

### params.apiKey.privateKey

`string`
The private key of the API key
